title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
asyd - (12/12/2008 09:40): hello there  
asyd - (12/12/2008 11:47): it's not possible to change an user's emaliadress?  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 11:47): there's a dedicated button in user profile  
asyd - (12/12/2008 11:48): hmm I can't see it in 1.6   
asyd - (12/12/2008 14:59): heya guys  
asyd - (12/12/2008 14:59): is there something wrong in these two lines?  
asyd - (12/12/2008 14:59): #set ($currentUser = $context.getLocalUser())  
asyd - (12/12/2008 14:59): #set ($buffer = $currentUser.isUserInGroup("XWikiAdminGroup"))  
asyd - (12/12/2008 15:02): if I want to display $buffer, velocity display $buffer, not a value, so I guess there is a problem with the isUserInGroup method  
asyd - (12/12/2008 15:06): hmm, seem I need to use $xwiki.getUser()  
asyd - (12/12/2008 15:06): my bad  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:34): jvdrean: btw, few days (Weeks?) ago you told me  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:34): 16:57 <jvdrean> classname + property name  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:34): 16:57 <asyd> separated by \_ ?  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:34): yep  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:35): it's \_0\_<property name> but it's working good :)  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:35): you have to put the object number on /save/  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:35): but on /objectadd/ you must not  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:36): hmm ok  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:36): because on object add you don't have to worry about object number  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:36): ok  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:37): but on save, imagine you have 4 comments, you must specify which object you want to modify  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:37): yeah indeed  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:37): XWiki.XWikiComment\_0\_comment, XWiki.XWikiComment\_1\_comment and so on  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:38): oh btw, do you know a bit xwiki watch? I wanted to try it yesterday, but I was a bit confused, I just have a Reader page, no new admin interface or whatever, and the installation guide just talk about the Reader page  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:47): raaaa xwiki interprets my [ ] in a javascript  
jvdrean - (12/12/2008 16:53): {pre}{/pre}  
asyd - (12/12/2008 16:53): yeha, thans
